content.raw: @nkoenig , just synced this with default and it still works like it used to. Not sure if we want to merge this first version like this or try to improve the usability. It would be nice to list more friedly names on the camera and target dropdowns, to click the scene to pick the node to follow, etc. I think this is a good first pass and we can add other functionality later.
